topics.body: A few hours ago, MrEnter got his Youtube account terminated. Fans may now have to cut their losses and form independent opinions of cartoons, learn that comedy mainly revolves around misery and understand that there is a good reason some kid shows only appeal to kids.
topics.author: 50d9a3aea4c72dc9b3000120

topics.body:
"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b4be216368724eaf820500#post_54b4be216368724eaf820500
What was he terminated for? Copyright?
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b4bceb6368721895c20600#post_54b4bceb6368721895c20600
I have a hard time laughing at that because... well... looking at my tastes in all but a few areas I can't help but think I probably would have had a really good time in the 70s and 80s.

Its not that new stuff is bad at all, I do indeed love video games, anime and the porn explosion that the internet unleashed but GODdamn would I love to have been around to see A New Hope in theaters, or to have been into Motorhead, Iron Maiden and Alice Cooper when those bands were in their prime instead of being the relative footnotes that they are in modern music.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b4bedb6368725742920b00#post_54b4bedb6368725742920b00
Yes, from Viacom.

After his Spongebob Animated Atrocities got struck by them, Youtube had to terminate his account as a result of these complaints.

He's currently taking refuge in Dailymotion though. Honestly, it's really fun being extremely fed up with him and especially his sheeple, labelled, "fans". Yeah, I'm being a douche but for your own damned good, please start forming actual opinions for once, fans of MrEnter.

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b4c14e6368720b589f0200#post_54b4c14e6368720b589f0200
Some guy who -reviews- rants about cartoons he doesn't like and raves about cartoons he does. Used to be a fan of him around mid-2013 and stopped after his "Troll" poem rave. Don't get me wrong, I know he didn't do anything wrong to me personally, but boy this man has gotten *way* too popular.
